Text: How can u put just .EXE file and belive people download it..??? I Have the oridinal DOOM2 and it is more than just a .EXE...

Anna73, it could be a self-extracting archive, but no-one uses that shit anymore, mostly because it's of no actual use, and just leaves the archive open for virus infections.. Have to agree with PhXAnarchy, the description, together with one exe, says it all...
